tool_description: GeoCoderPlus offers a specialized suite of geocoding utilities tailored for developers and businesses in need of precise location services. Featuring advanced methods such as GeocodePostalCode, GetDistancePostal, and GetDistanceGeo, GeoCoderPlus turns geographical data into meaningful, actionable information. Ideal for applications requiring accurate distance calculations, postal code geocoding, and detailed location analytics, GeoCoderPlus ensures high precision and reliability. Streamline y...
name: GeoCoderPlus
title: GeoCoderPlus

api_list.name: Get Distance Postal
api_list.description: Calculates the straight-line distance between two locations specified by their postal codes, providing the distance in either miles (m) or kilometers (km). This functionality is essential for services requiring postal code-based distance estimations for logistics, planning, or proximity-based features.

api_list.name: Get Distance Geo
api_list.description: Calculates the straight-line distance between two geographical points, defined by their latitude and longitude, providing the distance in either miles (m) or kilometers (km). This method is useful for applications that require distance calculations for mapping, navigation, or spatial analysis.

api_list.name: Geocode Postal Code
api_list.description: Converts a given postal code into its geographical coordinates, providing the latitude and longitude for the specified location. This is particularly useful for applications requiring spatial data or mapping functionalities.
